summary.span: 表示一个服务，该服务为类型转换器和标记扩展提供 XAML 架构上下文信息。

span.span: Represents a service that provides XAML schema context information to type converters and markup extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务提供了一个属性， 。The service provides one property, . 使用服务并将其属性时需要活动的 XAML 架构上下文从标记扩展或类型转换器的实现。Use the service and its property when you need the active XAML schema context from a markup extension or type converter implementation. 许多与 XAML 相关的操作，最值得注意的将 XAML 类型解析为对象图的创建，其后备类型依赖于在具有可用的 XAML 架构上下文。Many XAML-related operations, most notably resolving a XAML type into its backing type for object graph creation, rely on having an available XAML schema context. 但是，对于许多情况下，你可以使用由特定框架的 XAML 架构上下文。However, for many scenarios, you can use the XAML schema context that is provided by a particular framework. 或者，你可以使用由.NET Framework XAML 服务，它使用 CLR 和备份的反射提供默认 XAML 架构上下文，并且可以为任何 CLR 定义的类型提供必需的 XAML 架构上下文。Or you can use the default XAML schema context provided by .NET Framework XAML Services, which uses CLR and reflection backing and can provide the necessary XAML schema context for any CLR-defined type. 服务是主要相关的预计，当它支持的自定义 XAML 架构上下文时，也可能调用其值转换器实现的实现。The service is mainly relevant for implementations that anticipate that their value converter implementation might be called when it is supported by custom XAML schema contexts. 你可以从的虚方法的入口点参数获取服务或该报表服务上下文。You can get the service from the entry-point parameters of the virtual methods of or that report service context. 或者，你可以改为获取架构上下文，直接从特定的 XAML 读取器或 XAML 编写器的专用属性。Or you can instead get the schema context directly from dedicated properties of specific XAML readers or XAML writers.
